# We have successfully crafted 1 stone furnace. Now we can use this furnace to smelt the iron ore into iron plates.

# 1. Place the stone furnace in the world.
place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace)  # Place the stone furnace at the current position.

# 2. Load the iron ore and coal into the furnace for smelting.
load_resource(Prototype.StoneFurnace, 'iron-ore', quantity=10)  # Load 10 iron ore into the furnace.
load_resource(Prototype.StoneFurnace, 'coal', quantity=5)  # Load 5 coal into the furnace for fuel.

# 3. Start the smelting process.
start_smelting(Prototype.StoneFurnace)  # Begin smelting the iron ore into iron plates.
print(f"Smelting started in the furnace.")  # Confirm that smelting has started.
